Item ID1309

The iron 2h sword is a two-handed sword that is stronger than the bronze 2h sword. As with other iron weaponry, it can be wielded at level 1 Attack.

Players can make an iron 2h sword with the Smithing skill at level 29 using 3 iron bars, giving the player 75 Smithing experience.
